subject: Two More Precincts Heard From
event:
For my readers overseas...

The drumbeat for GAME OF THRONES has started on the other side of the pond.

Here's a Spanish translation of "Inside Game of Thrones" from Canal+, who'll be televising the series in Spain.

<lj-embed id="131"/>

And for my friends and fans in the UK and Ireland, we have the first trailer from Sky Atlantic:

<lj-embed id="132"/>

Enjoy.

comments.article: The Spanish actor dubbing you has such a resonant voice!
I always imagined Jon Snow with a sharper facer
Why Canal +?? *cries*
Such a bizarre woman's voice on the UK trailer. Show looks sexy hot though, absolutely 100% cannot wait.
I think that's Mariella Frostrup, who is well-known over here for her 'smoky, sexy' voice (not that I'm sure it is).
Just had a random thought - would kind of be cool if Benioff had a cameo in the show. I'm picturing him as a Karstark :)
and Weiss could be a Florent or a Frey...

Gracias for this video Mr. Martin, it has make me remember why I love so much these books.


Best regards from the overseas spanistargaryens!!
comments.subject: GRACIAS!

comments.article:
Sigh, not coming to UPC - yet. :-( Sky is (understandably) keeping Atlantic exclusive, at least for the moment.

George, don't suppose you've heard if/when it'll be made available to other channels in Ireland or Britain?

I have no information on that... but I'm not sure why Sky would WANT to make it available to other channels. After all, they paid a lot of money for exclusive rights to HBO's programming. The whole point of that is to persuade people to sign up for their channel. Offering it to the competition would seem to undercut that.

But maybe things work differently over there. I don't really know.
I was adding stuff to my Netflix cue and found myself already impatient that I can't get the series on DVD yet . . .

I do not get channel Sky but I will get DVD box set certainly! Many glowing words from actors, is like LORD OF RINGS but serial (because LOTR actor say many of good things about film while producing)! (also director Jackson has beard of George Martin, is similar no?)

I am wondering if season does well maybe WILD CARDS series of television is possible? Or DOORWAY (of comics I am interested released soon). If J.J.Abrams has many TV show maybe George Martin have just as many! Maybe WESTEROS series gateways to other projects! ))))
Yeah I was squeeing with excitement when I caught a glimpse on a Sky Atlantic ad.
Any noise from Australian boradcasters?  You've done a good job of publicising the show, and I'm pretty excited, but I suspect we'll get it delayed... either way; can't wait!
Any word on whether it will be shown in Australia or which channel? I really would sign up for cable TV just to be able to watch this!
Oddly enough, I believe it will be on Showtime in Australia.
Will there be a release of the series here in Germany? I can hardly wait for it! °_°
NOOOOOOO!!!!!! A PPV channel :'( And whit this new intellectual property law the sites where I can see it "alegally" will be closed!!!!

Hello, my name is Orlando M. I'm Mexican and I'm a fan of you, the way you write is really awesome, game of thrones was best fantasy book I've read in my entire life, congratulations on the success you have. maybe write is crazy because that might you not read this but even so it does not matter lol. I know its comming Game of thrones on the HBO, I think they already have all the music to accompany the series, but I have a recommendation for the Spanish fans there is a Mexican singer and composer who has much success throughout Latin America and Spain, his name is Leonel Garcia, has a new album in which there is a song called Broken, is a song that is perfect for Bran. only a recommendation but I would love to hear it in the series, thanks for reading and congratulations on your successful work.
comments.subject: Music for Game of Throne

comments.article: I can't wait... it's going to be ~awesome :D

Wait, isn't Canal + supposed to be a French channel ?
... Does that men we'll have it too ?

I believe French rights belong to Orange.

Whatever that is.

Can't wait for this to come out!

Any chance there will be miniatures crafted to look like the actors? That would be awesome, I am almost done painting the ones I have and need a new project!
comments.subject: Very excited!

comments.article: Many more miniatures will be released by Dark Sword, but they will not look like the actors.  We do not have the right to use those likenesses.
comments.subject: Re: Very excited!

comments.article:
Yes, Orange, which has some TV channels through Livebox and other cable programs, has the rights to the series. For the moment, if you are an Oange user (livebox, mobile phone or phone) you have a special offer 1€ per month for 3 months then 12€ per month...Now that you mention it, I think this offer ended on January the 31st. I got it for Game of Thrones though but I don't know when they will show it in France.
For Mr Martin, Orange is a company which bought France Telecom and has the biggest part of the phone market over here.

Thank you very much for the spanish trailer. I'm waiting anxious for the begining!

Saludos desde España Jorge! (George)

Please Mr.Martin if you could do something to allow overseas fan of the series watch the original version of the series that would be awesome.Canal + is so expensive not many people will pay for that. I allways have to search american series on illegal websites what i dont like very much
comments.subject: SpanishFans

comments.article:
A3's free-to-air Nitro channel will be broadcasting the series, though not until some time after Canal+'s run.

I'm afraid George, nor any of the crew members, can influence where or how the show will air, neither domestically nor overseas. It's entirely up to HBO and it's international rights division, as well as those foreign broadcasters who may have options for allowing alternative methods for non-subscribers.
comments.subject: Re: SpanishFans

comments.article:
At least, a spanish trailer!

Very short, but it´s ok.
News from Italy? anyone knows what tv'll show Agot?
comments.subject: Italy?

comments.article:
there's massive excitement here in Ireland - lots of us waiting patiently (oh ok slightly impatiently :) ) for AGOT to start on sky Atlantic. I know folk who got sky hd just to see AGOT in high def :) the trailers look fabulous and in every "coming soon to sky Atlantic" montage they show at least one clip from AGOT.
And of course we have friends without sky who will mysteriously choose that night to call round !

I spotted my first trailer for it on HBO Asia earlier this week.  Unfortunately the list of things you can't show on Thai TV (even HBO) reads like a list of Ice & Fire plot points, I'm afraid the show is going to look like it was shot with a gallon of vaseline on the lens.
